---
title: "Sprint#02: Ways towards A Net-Zero Society, Take NYC as an Example"
date: "2023-04-21"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r}
file_path <- file.path(dirname(rstudioapi::getSourceEditorContext()$path), "dataset/nyc_eui_census.csv")
raw_data <- read_csv(file_path)
eui_bg <- as_tibble(raw_data)

```
```{r}
eui_bg_fil <- eui_bg %>%
  filter(Site_EUI__ < 500)
lm1 <- lm(Site_EUI__ ~ income, data = eui_bg_fil)
lm1_data <- eui_bg_fil %>%
  data_grid(income, Site_EUI__) %>%
  add_predictions(lm1) %>%
  add_residuals(lm1)
lm1_data
ggplot(data = eui_bg_fil) +
  geom_point(aes(x = income, y = Site_EUI__), size = 0.2) +
  geom_line(data = lm1_data, aes(x = income, y = pred))
```
